channel.title: Wii U
channel.description:
Anyone hyped for this? http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0050SVHZO/
I'm somewhat interested in this, since I like nintendo games and if they have third party support it's definitely a buy for me. ps4/xbox720(?) have nothing really to offer to me since I play on the pc mostly. Thoughts?

item.title: Wii U
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:29, topic:442450”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=545077.msg3997779#msg3997779 date=1337519154]

Wii dominated the market because it was $250 during a recession. So when the three consoles came out, wii was on top. Nintendo is awesome, wii was interesting. PlayStation needs to die. Xbox needs to stop a new call of duty every other month and halo spins offs.

PlayStation > Xbox.
[/quote]It’s always been ps vs xbox, not many people take wii seriously.[/quote]

lol because of hardcore 360 no scope games. “mature games for mature gamers like ourselves”.
seriously the xbox/ps3 have no good games, what it does have are 3rd party games in which the
wii does not have bc nintendo is retarded about. And those 3rd party games are bettered played
on the pc so the xbox/ps3 are trash.

@rodger you could buy the classic controller, but i can see how that’s a pain to do. I liked aiming with
the wii control, can’t say much about driving since i don’t really like racing games.

Read full topic

item.title: Wii U
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:30, topic:442450”]If wii produced better games and had an actual controller for shooter/race games. Maybe wii would be on top.[/quote]I wish my console produced games.

Read full topic

item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“TheSuperManFlys, post:9, topic:442450”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=545077.msg3995743#msg3995743 date=1337226657]
Wrong section, and no im not that excited.
[/quote]

if(Alive == true) {
        for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
                i -= 1;
        }
}

Cool for having a loop in your signature, I guess you look good in the RS2 section for having it amirite?

OT:
I hate the wii. Xbox 360 all the way[/quote]BRO!
Don’t dis php, took me a week to get to that point.

item.title: Wii U
item.dc:creator: @TheSuperManFlys TheSuperManFlys
item.description:
@TheSuperManFlys wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:12, topic:442450”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=545077.msg3995861#msg3995861 date=1337257747]

rscShadow did you like ss? I’ve yet to play it, I feel compelled to finish tp first
but I haven’t had time to finish it.

runescape sucks stop getting mad over something so trivial.

nolives what console are you excited for ?
[/quote]I never finished SS yet but I’m pretty close. I like it a lot better than TP.

TP is kinda of dull, but I love zelda games.

@waj , I agree it kind get boring but it has plenty of exclusives and good for playing with friends.
@rodger, I doubt it the motion sensors imo aren’t that great.
@supermanflys, how can anyone defend the xbox 360 ew lol[/quote]

Only system I play lol. I have the Wii but I just don’t like it at all really, I play Black ops and MW3 on the Xbox 360, and Skyrim sometimes. Only thing I like on the wii is the bowling

Read full topic

item.title: Wii U
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Besides the motion censors they can really build wii sports to be like a professional environment.

Baseball : Have a draft of wii characters, and a wii budget. Make the best team and play a season type thing.
Bowling : Incorporate different bowling balls, different oil patterns, and have an actually online/offline tournament/league.

Read full topic
